name: Biomorphic Art Nouveau CTA - Emerald Swirl
description: A luxurious CTA section with an Art Nouveau biomorphic design. Features deep emerald tones, gold accents, and flowing floral motifs. Includes an elegant heading, descriptive text, and a prominent call-to-action button, set against a subtly textured background.

style_analysis.visual_identity: Luxurious Art Nouveau with deep emerald and muted gold, organic floral elements.
